{"id":208581915,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 years, 10 months","timestamp":1550434528,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/208581915/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"9.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int n = word1.length();\n        int m = word2.length();\n    \n        int dp[n+1][m+1];\n        dp[0][0] = 0;\n        for(int i=1;i<n+1;i++) dp[i][0] = 1 + dp[i-1][0];\n        for(int i=1;i<m+1;i++) dp[0][i] = 1 + dp[0][i-1];\n        \n        for(int i=1;i<n+1;i++){\n            for(int j=1;j<m+1;j++){\n                if(word1[i-1] == word2[j-1])\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1];\n                else \n                    dp[i][j] = 1 + min(dp[i-1][j],min(dp[i][j-1],dp[i-1][j-1]));\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[n][m];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance"}
